name: The Sarcastic Escape
description:
The Sacastic Escape is a take on the "Text Adventure" genre but as a game dev we decided to add some sounds and music where we could.
We hope you like it or the least provide us with some criticism(positive of course) on how we can improve these types of games in the future and lastly
Have Fun playing games
P.S. if you want to make a similar game with a similar style i've put up an easy to use unity template you can download
